0321.name: Unknown
0321.message:
The USB storage device could not be
accessed.

Please check that the USB storage
device is connected correctly.

If standby functions are enabled, the
power LED will turn orange when
downloading and installing data after
the console is powered down. Do not
disconnect the USB storage device
while the power LED is orange.

If you have confirmed that the USB
storage device is connected properly
but the problem persists, the issue may
be that the USB storage device is not
receiving enough power.

If you think this may be the case,
please turn the Wii U console off, and
then plug in the USB storage device's
AC adapter (if included) or connect the
device to the Wii U console using a
USB Y cable, as applicable.

If the problem persists, please make
a note of the error code and visit
support.nintendo.com.
